title: Freshservice - Tickets
description: This dashboard provides information about the Tickets generated on Freshservice.

definition.content:
Gain better visibility into your organization's security events by monitoring Freshservice - Ticket logs with this dashboard. 

With Freshservice, you can easily track and manage all your IT tickets in one centralized dashboard, gaining deep insights into ticket details and trends for efficient issue resolution. This dashboard offers a holistic view of tickets, providing valuable insights into various ticket attributes such as incident type, major incidents, priority, severity, category, escalations, departments, and more.

For more information, see the [Freshservice Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/freshservice).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Ticket logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](https://app.datadoghq.com/security?query=source%3Afreshservice%20service%3Aticket%20&agg_m=count&agg_m_source=base&agg_t=count&column=time&fromUser=false&order=desc&start=1725871049430&end=1725957449430&paused=false).

definition.title: Distribution of Major Incident by type
